class_notes:
This course will be offered fully ONLINE. 
Permission code request form: http://bit.ly/QTM2021
This course is designed to introduce students to the multivariate linear regression model and the method for dealing with nonexperimental data. It will equip students with understanding of the workhorse in econometrics and statistics. The assumption violations in nonexperimental data and their solutions are also covered.
course_description: Introduces students to multivariate linear regression model and method for dealing with non-experimental data. It will equip students with understanding of the workhorse in econometrics and statistics.
prerequisites: QTM 220 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
